TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Gohogo, title = Gohogo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gohogo} }

S.FORM: Gohogo Gohogo hya ga cyux maki qsahuy na Sincikeng. Gohogo qani hya ga sinnluan na sexu na Thelu, gi maki sqa Gipun hya ga Syakaru bang sun nya sraral. ru sami ka mnaki Mumuyamasung sun hya ga, rhzyal na maispazik qaniy hya. babau nya lga, mingaygut muah tmuang qu kahul kya Sqzyacing ru kahul kya Rakus. ru babau nya lga, kya qu kahul i. Slamau muah tmuang sqani la. Rhiyan knkyan zik cinlalu Gohogo hiya ga skura rhiyan Tayal te sobih inbyaqan wagi ki te hlhun sa Sincikusya Cukutomaci, ryax nasa ga nyux klhangang cinqlangan Nipun, tmsuqan mciriq lga p'yugun Sexu, san naha Sinciken Gohogo lalu nya la. Gohogo hiya ga nyux skura te sobih inbyaqan wagi ki te hlhun sa Sinciken, hminas 2000 meta ski 3000 meta qa rrgyax nya, cinbcyan payat qalang Tayal, qalang Spazi, qalang mehuman, qalang Tunan ro qalang Mtoyu, ini ga Ulay son nha. ssquliq nyux skaki kya hiya ga maki squliq Tayal ru Saysya, maki cikay hazi qa Ngayngay ru mbinah na ssquliq uzi. Mita qsya aring puqing qsya ski htgan bcilung qsya qani ga piyang nya ga cinbcyan lalu na llyung hiya ga maki, gong Yepakan, gong Skaru, gong mebalay, gong mekaran ro gong mehuman, skura mkhbu ni Cukuto ki llyung linahuy, krayas qalang b'nux qa hngawan kasu Sinciku ro skura htux tyaba bcilung. Qnxan Tayal ki rakis 1.pitung kilux qu qalang Ulay cinlalu pitung kilux qu qalang Ulay sraral hiya ga pitung mkilux nqu Inowe, ryax nqu kinlhangan Nipun hiya ga phngiyang nqa lalu nya, 1914 kawas ga snyan naha qutux knkyan pphgupan, ke na Tayal hiyan ga san naha Ulay pzitan maha, pitung htgan lkyux nqu balay ywaw nya. Gohogo hiya ga knkyan qa Ipantekina CangsyeyLyang, trang nyux binhlan qu phaw na Koka 2.Pasta'ay Saysyat rhiyan ptyagan Pasta'ay qa Saysya hiya ptyagun naha Gohogo, baq s'agal lungan llpyung kahul ana n'inu uwah naha mangay. 3.ptyagan na Sahat Inoyi hiya ga nyux maki sqani uzi. 4.hacisyo qalang Ulay 1913 kawas ga ptlu pintriqan sa qalang Skaru hiya. 1915 kawas 6 byacing mpuw magal ryax snyan naha Inuwe kunitaro nqu lalu nya ps'uyux Hacisya tnu Inowe, galan na qes na シヤカロ－, ini kbsyaq lga Inowe hacisyo snyan nah tgiqas na lalu . 1922年4 byacing 1 ryax,pin'yugan naha Inowe hacisyo knkyan na Sahat, syan naha qutux socyo, tmsuqan mciriq lga in'yugun naha tgiqas na lalu hacisyo na qalang Ulay. 5.tuqi hkngyan Skaru tuqi hkngyan mangay Skaru qani, Slu qu lalu nya uzi. aring Inowe ski qalang Tunan, aring giqas tuqi wahan nqu qalang Mentoyu pwah tkara tuqi, krayas gong Skaru ski quri Skaru, kya hazi 1922 kawas cyugal ryax wayal naha suqun skbalay tuqi hkngyan halan mangay llpyung. tkbaqan 1.pinqwasan laqi cipaq pinqwasan laqi cipaq qu qalang Spazi pinqwasan laqi cipaq qu mehuman pinqwasan laqi cipaq qu Ulay 2. pinqwasan laqi hopa pinqwasan laqi hopa qu llyung Spazi Lmosay halan mangay klhangan Gohogo hiya ga maki rgyax Spazi, maki Koyen Syepa Koka, ptyagan na gaga Pasta'ay Saysyat, halan lmosay cisan hhlahuy, maki tuqi hkngyan,maki tgliq ….kya. B'bu rgyax Spazi b'bu rgyax Spazi cyux maki lingay na Gohogo, Cukuto, go na Peypu, si say maha qutux kbhul na rrgyax hiya ga nyan lpgun kbawiq na rgyax uzi. Turuy ginlgan Gohogo ga maki tuqi ttazil turuy, 122 linpgan nya ubuy klhangan na Taywang glgan basu hiya ga basu na Sinciken Glagan sheluq turuy ungat glgan kisya sheluq Gohogo qani Cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' 五峰鄉公所

Gohogo Gohogo hya ga cyox maki qsahoy na Sincikeng. Gohogo qani hya ga sinnloan na sexo na Thelo, gi maki sqa Gipon hya ga Syakaro bang son nya sraral. ro sami ka mnaki Momoyamasong son hya ga, rhzyal na maispazik qaniy hya. babao nya lga, mingaygot moah tmoang qo kahol kya Sqzyacing ro kahol kya Rakos. ro babao nya lga, kya qo kahol i. Slamao moah tmoang sqani la. Rhiyan knkyan zik cinlalo Gohogo hiya ga skora rhiyan Tayal te sobih inbyaqan wagi ki te hlhon sa Sincikosya Cokotomaci, ryax nasa ga nyox klhangang cinqlangan Nipon, tmsoqan mciriq lga p'yogon Sexo, san naha Sinciken Gohogo lalo nya la. Gohogo hiya ga nyox skora te sobih inbyaqan wagi ki te hlhon sa Sinciken, hminas 2000 meta ski 3000 meta qa rrgyax nya, cinbcyan payat qalang Tayal, qalang Spazi, qalang mehoman, qalang Tonan ro qalang Mtoyo, ini ga Ulay son nha. ssqoliq nyox skaki kya hiya ga maki sqoliq Tayal ro Saysya, maki cikay hazi qa Ngayngay ro mbinah na ssqoliq ozi. Mita qsya aring poqing qsya ski htgan bcilong qsya qani ga piyang nya ga cinbcyan lalo na llyong hiya ga maki, gong Yepakan, gong Skaro, gong mebalay, gong mekaran ro gong mehoman, skora mkhbo ni Cokoto ki llyong linahoy, krayas qalang b'nox qa hngawan kaso Sinciko ro skora htox tyaba bcilong. Qnxan Tayal ki rakis 1.pitong kilox qo qalang Ulay cinlalo pitong kilox qo qalang Ulay sraral hiya ga pitong mkilox nqo Inowe, ryax nqo kinlhangan Nipon hiya ga phngiyang nqa lalo nya, 1914 kawas ga snyan naha qotox knkyan pphgopan, ke na Tayal hiyan ga san naha Ulay pzitan maha, pitong htgan lkyox nqo balay ywaw nya. Gohogo hiya ga knkyan qa Ipantekina CangsyeyLyang, trang nyox binhlan qo phaw na Koka 2.Pasta'ay Saysyat rhiyan ptyagan Pasta'ay qa Saysya hiya ptyagon naha Gohogo, baq s'agal longan llpyong kahol ana n'ino owah naha mangay. 3.ptyagan na Sahat Inoyi hiya ga nyox maki sqani ozi. 4.hacisyo qalang Ulay 1913 kawas ga ptlo pintriqan sa qalang Skaro hiya. 1915 kawas 6 byacing mpow magal ryax snyan naha Inowe konitaro nqo lalo nya ps'oyox Hacisya tno Inowe, galan na qes na シヤカロ－, ini kbsyaq lga Inowe hacisyo snyan nah tgiqas na lalo . 1922年4 byacing 1 ryax,pin'yogan naha Inowe hacisyo knkyan na Sahat, syan naha qotox socyo, tmsoqan mciriq lga in'yogon naha tgiqas na lalo hacisyo na qalang Ulay. 5.toqi hkngyan Skaro toqi hkngyan mangay Skaro qani, Slo qo lalo nya ozi. aring Inowe ski qalang Tonan, aring giqas toqi wahan nqo qalang Mentoyo pwah tkara toqi, krayas gong Skaro ski qori Skaro, kya hazi 1922 kawas cyogal ryax wayal naha soqon skbalay toqi hkngyan halan mangay llpyong. tkbaqan 1.pinqwasan laqi cipaq pinqwasan laqi cipaq qo qalang Spazi pinqwasan laqi cipaq qo mehoman pinqwasan laqi cipaq qo Ulay 2. pinqwasan laqi hopa pinqwasan laqi hopa qo llyong Spazi Lmosay halan mangay klhangan Gohogo hiya ga maki rgyax Spazi, maki Koyen Syepa Koka, ptyagan na gaga Pasta'ay Saysyat, halan lmosay cisan hhlahoy, maki toqi hkngyan,maki tgliq ….kya. B'bo rgyax Spazi b'bo rgyax Spazi cyox maki lingay na Gohogo, Cokoto, go na Peypo, si say maha qotox kbhol na rrgyax hiya ga nyan lpgon kbawiq na rgyax ozi. Toroy ginlgan Gohogo ga maki toqi ttazil toroy, 122 linpgan nya oboy klhangan na Taywang glgan baso hiya ga baso na Sinciken Glagan sheloq toroy ongat glgan kisya sheloq Gohogo qani Cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' 五峰鄉公所
